spatial_accuracy.notes: Overall layout resembles the 2D plan (left bedroom, central corridor, bathroom cluster, right bedroom, living room, and kitchen/dining), but there are notable deviations: an extra enclosed top-side room appears, bathroom/vanity area is reconfigured, several exterior window locations/counts do not match the 2D openings, and some room sizes (corridor vs. living/dining) look stretched compared to the plan.

structural_fidelity.notes: Wall thickness and basic construction are mostly consistent, and most doors are embedded into partition walls. However, adjacency is compromised by a hallucinated top-side room and altered wet-area layout (extra vanity/sinks). The core rooms largely exist, but the added room constitutes a major fidelity failure.

furniture_mapping.notes: Major furniture elements are mostly present (beds/wardrobes, living seating, dining table, kitchen run). Some furniture is simplified or repositioned relative to the 2D plan (kitchen counters/appliances and desk/office elements), but scale is generally consistent and readable.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Render is clean with coherent lighting and good visual clarity. Camera is near-isometric but not perfectly orthographic (mild perspective). Geometry is mostly clean; no severe mesh artifacts observed.

detected_errors.description: Hallucinated enclosed room along the top side (empty room with an arched brown door and window) that is not present in the 2D floor plan.
Wet-area/bathroom zone is spatially reconfigured: a double-sink/vanity area and radiator appear in the top room area, which does not match the single-bath arrangement shown in the 2D plan.
Hallucinated plumbing fixtures (two pedestal sinks) not indicated in the 2D plan.
Exterior window placement/count differs: the 3D render adds/relocates multiple large windows (notably on right/top exterior walls) that do not correspond clearly to the 2D plan’s window openings.
Proportion distortion: central circulation and the kitchen/dining area appear enlarged relative to the living room and some bedrooms compared to the 2D plan.
Kitchen layout is simplified/altered versus the 2D plan (counter run and appliance/sink placement do not precisely match the drawn arrangement).
